title: Three storied house with annex for sale at Pelawatta Battaramulla
details:
Architecturally designed three storied house for sale at Rathnayaka mawatha, Pelawatta, Battaramulla
Spacious sitting and dinning area
Four bed rooms
Three bath rooms
Pantry area
Two bed roomed annex in basement
Two parking spaces
90 % completed
Selling for financial urgency
